go_data.justification: PNG1 was definitively shown to encode PNGase by carrying out the analysis of reaction product of [14C]asialofetuin glycopeptide I with purified Png1p.
The action of PNGase in the cytosol (or nucleus) may somehow be regulated by redox potential.
The action of PNGase in the cytosol (or nucleus) may somehow be regulated by redox potential.
